custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT exportImportConfigurationId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ExportImportConfiguration WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (type_ = ?)

SELECT {ExportImportConfiguration.*} FROM ExportImportConfiguration WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (type_ = ?) ORDER BY createDate DESC
